接口 GameEvent

所有已知实现类:
BargainEvent, BusinessOpportunityEvent, CarAccidentEvent, DepositEvent, Game2048Event, GuessNumberEvent, HospitalEvent, InflationEvent, InvestmentOpportunityEvent, LoanEvent, LotteryEvent, PropertyMarketEvent, PropertyOpportunityEvent, QuizEvent, ReactionEvent, RepaymentEvent, StartEvent, StockMarketEvent, StockOpportunityEvent, WindfallEvent, WithdrawEvent
public interface GameEvent
